profile: University of Chicago, Class of 2018 (double major in Economics and Mathematics). National Merit Scholar. Developer with expert Ruby and Objective-C, Cocoa, and Swift experience. Expert in creating world-class experiences for users and developers. Speaker at meetups and conferences around the country. Code used on several hundred million devices daily, and by millions of developers. Leader of global development teams of open-source projects.

work.name: Realm
accomplishments: Released a Swift binding for the Realm database
Supported users with usage issues, bugs, and feature requests
Implemented support for nullable / optional values at the binding level
Contributed bug fixes and minor enhancements to C++ Core

work.name: CocoaPods (Stripe's Open Source Retreat)
accomplishments: Wrote a reference-implementation dependency resolution algorithm
Integrated work into CocoaPods, Bundler & RubyGems for use by hundreds of thousands of developers

work.name: Tumblr
accomplishments: Rewrote critical application components to enable bug fixes and crucial feature development
Ensured a consistent experience across different-sized devices
Redesigned the core Tumblr dashboard experience
Collaborated closely with the Creative, Security, and API teams to ensure a top-notch user experience

work.name: Slader
accomplishments: Took over codebase from foreign contractor
Customized mobile experience, increasing customer satisfaction and revenues per user
Released two new major versions with over 75,000 monthly active users

work.name: Codecademy
accomplishments: Prototyped new entries into the mobile space
Led a beta test of a new product category
Explored moving existing products onto mobile platforms

education.name: University of Chicago
education.degree: The College, B.S., Mathematics, B.A., Economics
education.aside:
Recipient of the 2014 Jane Morton and Henry C. Murphy Award for student leadership
Dean's List 2014

hobbies: Avid reader with wide-range of interests, including history, statistics, and social theory
Core team member on RestKit, CocoaPods & Bundler.
